descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------------
SAALIA LVL 1 BRETON SAVE GAME
-----------------------------------------

IMPORTANT : If you want Saalia to look like on the pictures then you need these mods :

Better Females by Bella : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

ApachiiSkyHair : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168


If you have an error window when loading the save game then you don\'t got apachii skyhair already 

installed. If not everything is alright .


NOTE : You can edit her face and name by the \"showracemenu\" console command.


MY OTHER MODS :

HD Ore And Ingots : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9912

Creative Ore And Ingots : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7529

Xtrem Gold Coin Retexturation : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11141

----------------
DESCRIPTION
----------------

This mod is a save game.

Saalia is a leved 1 Breton, saved just in the donjon before escaping from Helgen.

Let me know if you have some request or if you find any issue with this save.

Feedback is always welcome, ENDORSE if you like it !

-----------------
INSTALLATION
-----------------

- Drop Saalia\'s save game in your save game folder.
- Enjoy !

------------------
REQUIREMENTS
------------------

- The Elder Scroll V : SKYRIM

---------------------
INCOMPATIBILITY
---------------------

NONE
author: BioProd
